basics.label: Engineering Leadership
basics.name: M. Adam Kendall
basics.summary: Engineering leader with 25+ years of experience solving complex technical challenges, largely in regulated industries. I build effective engineering teams by focusing on clear communication, measurable outcomes, and genuine mentorship. My approach combines practical technology choices with careful attention to costs - including extensive hands-on contributions to open-source projects over two decades. I believe in creating transparent work environments where teams understand both the technical and business context of their work.
